title: Roast crown of wood pigeon with peas and mousseron
description: Mousseron are delicious little mushrooms grown wild in France. Their earthy flavour matches the pigeon, while peas and mint add a touch of spring.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
150g/5½oz peas, podded, blanched in a pan of boiling water and refreshed in ice cold water
1 head Little Gem lettuce, finely chopped
